content: this intermediate-level project combines the timeless elegance of lace with the modern flair of chevron stitching creating a stylish and versatile piece that will surely become a staple in your wardrobe the pattern includes detailed written instructions a crochet chart and a video tutorial to guide you through the process whether you re looking to add a touch of sophistication to your outfit or seeking a thoughtful handmade gift this chevron lace infinity scarf pattern is the perfect choice for crochet enthusiasts
